title: Tasty Pepper Chicken ( Milagu )  Gravy Recipe
content:
Spicy black pepper chicken gravy goes well with roti, rice or idli or dosa too. This spicy chicken curry tastes super delicious and very peppery.

I have shared a few varieties of pepper chicken and mutton recipes here. But I haven’t shared the pepper chicken gravy which we simply love. I make this all the time. So here it is. It is not at all hard to make, it is super easy to make and taste simply amazing.

 

Pepper Chicken Gravy Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 500 grams

Coconut Oil - ¼ cup

Bay Leaf - 1

Onion - 2 large sliced thinly

Green Chilli - 2 slit

Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tablespoons

Tomatoes - 2 large chopped finely

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Chilli powder - 2 teaspoons

Garam Masala Powder - 2 teaspoons

Salt to taste

Coriander Leaves for garnishing

 

FOR ROASTING & GRINDING:

Oil - 1 tsp

Fennel Seeds / Saunf / Sombu - 1 tablespoon

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Black Pepper - 1 tablespoon

Coriander Seeds - 2 tablespoons

Onion - 1 large chopped

 

Instructions

Pressure cook chicken with a little salt for 2 to 3 whistles. Set aside.

Heat little oil in a pot. Add in spices and toast them. Take it in a blender.

Add onions and cook till golden brown. Add it with the spices and grind till smooth. Set aside.

Heat oil in a pot, add in onions, chilies and bay leaf. Cook till golden.

Add in ginger garlic paste and cook till raw smell leaves.

Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy.

Add in the ground masala and mix well.

Add salt, turmeric powder, chili powder, and garam masala and cook till oil separates.

Now add in the chicken along with any cooking liquid.

Mix well and simmer till oil separates.

Add coriander leaves and mix well.

Serve it.
